articles.title: Watch Live: Robert Telles, charged with murder in death of journalist Jeff German, expected to take the stand
articles.description: Robert Telles is expected to take the stand in his own defense Wednesday. The former elected official is accused of killing a Las Vegas journalist.
articles.content:
Robert Telles, the former Clark County public administrator accused of murder in the 2022 death of Las Vegas journalist Jeff German, is expected to take the stand in his own defense Wednesday.
